item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Project 1
item.description: Exploring Game Trends in NBA Seasons Introduction In these datasets, I explored the statistical trends of two different NBA seasons before the All-Star break. The All-Star break is a week-long bye week for all 30 teams in the league and is commonly used demarcate the two halves of the season. Since the NBA season is so long — lasting from October to April with playoffs in May and June — and each team plays 82 games, the All-Star break is a helpful way to organize storylines, trends, and general statistics.
